meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Annie Marggraf John Paul Gove Todd DeFilippi Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7483.

td.p: Annie Marggraf, an unemployed bartender from Vancouver, Washington
John Paul Gove, a social media marketer and go-go dancer from Laverne, California
Todd DeFilippi, a software engineer from Mountain View, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,583)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL CELEBS?
SPECIAL MONTHS
PLAYS & PLAYWRIGHTS
NATIONALITEASE
MUSIC SOOTHES
THE SAVAGE BEAST
